subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Uruguay has managed to produce two world-class strikers — Diego Forlán and Luis Suárez — to give the defensively stingy team a new and ominous balance.
snippet: Uruguay has managed to produce two world-class strikers — Diego Forlán and Luis Suárez — to give the defensively stingy team a new and ominous balance.
